title: What if the last whisper items were changed so the armor pen would only apply to auto attacks?
body: This way the flat armor pen rush would still work for most ad casters, but they would fall behind traditional crit based builds in the late game.

replies.body:
what if cleaver was just changed to scale with base ad, like steraks gage?

i feel like this change has been overdue for a while now. make all bruiser items grant bonus ad based off their base ad, and theyd automatically be less effective on ranged adc, and melee adc.

{{item:3748}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3071}} 

if you want to get rid of bruiser yasuo, this is the easiest way aswell. skirmishers and marksmen usually have the lowest base ad.

alternatively this could be taken a step further.

- make sheen passives scale with a mix of champion level and base ad, to reduce the impact of a champions base ad value on the proc.
- change skirmisher, marksmen and assassin ability scalings entirely to **bonus ad.**
- make bruiser items increase **base ad** of a champion by a % exactly like steraks

now these items do shit for champions they dont belong. they would still get the passives, but barely any straight up damage out of them other than to their auto attacks.
